page.title: 02THE POST OFFICE
page.content:
There is a Sub Post Office in the residence of Mr. & Mrs. John Sinclair in the centre of Lady village. There is a letter-box with access from the outside while inside facilities are provided for the posting of parcels and the purchase of stamps and postal orders. People can also obtain Old Age Pensions and Family Allowances. { {Vouchers}provided by{Orkney Islands {Council,}to enable local people travelling with the{inter-island air {service}to do so at a cheaper rate, can also be had at this office.
This post office also has a small shop that stocks items such as cosmetics, greetings cards and stationery.
